issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

When attempting to run Code Analyzer on an Alloy project in Studio the analysis fails with the following {{Cannot read property 'value' of undefined}}.

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. In Studio create a new Alloy project
2. Right click on the project and choose Code Analysis->iPhone

h5.Actual Result

The code analysis will fail with the error {{Cannot read property 'value' of undefined}}


h5.Expected Result

The code analysis should not fail
fields.summary: Code Analyzer: Analysis fails with: 'Cannot read property 'value' of undefined'
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.10.3
Appc Studio: 4.0.0.201505070727
Titanium SDK build: 4.0.0.v20150508112613
Appc CLI (NPM): 0.3.55
Appc CLI (Registry): 0.2.282
Code Analyzer: 1.1.1

comments.body: [~eharris] do you have a fuller stack trace?

When I try the above steps I get a different error:
{code}
Code Analysis has encountered a problem.
No output received.
{code}

Used:
MacOS 10.10.3
Studio 4.0.0.201505121820
Ti SDK 4.0.0.RC4
Appc NPM 0.3.55
Appc CLI 0.2.285
Ti CLI 4.0.0-beta8
Alloy 1.6.0-beta4
Node v0.10.37
Java 1.7.0_45

I also am now getting the same error as [~ewieber]

Using:

Mac OSX 10.10.3
Appc Studio: 4.0.0.201505121820
Titanium SDK build: 4.0.0.RC4
Appc CLI (NPM): 0.3.55
